glsa.title: libTIFF: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in libTIFF, allowing remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause Denial of Service.

background.p: libTIFF provides support for reading and manipulating TIFF (Tagged Image File Format) images.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in libTIFF. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A remote attacker could entice a user to open a specially crafted TIFF file with an application making use of libTIFF, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the user running the application or a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
